address_provider.description: Address provider returns addresses for all protocol contracts

channel_id.description: The channel ID of the mars hub

fee_collector_denom.description: The asset to which the fee collector share is converted

safety_fund_denom.description: The asset to which the safety fund share is converted

safety_tax_rate.description: Percentage of fees that are sent to the safety fund

timeout_blocks.description: Number of blocks after which an IBC transfer is to be considered failed, if no acknowledgement is received

timeout_revision.description: Revision number of Mars Hub's IBC client

timeout_seconds.description: Number of seconds after which an IBC transfer is to be considered failed, if no acknowledgement is received

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
